data.name: Sludge Fighters
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

The first Sludge Fighters Early Access update is landing in February 2022!

We're busy:

  • *Testing movement mechanic fix
  • *Testing networking fix
  • *Testing UE5 performance vs UE4 fix
  • *Testing UX enhancements
  • *Adding a couple UI elements

Watch for more news on Sludge Fighters updates! We're excited to explore how we can make Sludge Fighters the most gravity-defying fun possible.


About the Game

Gravity follows you! Launch to a surface and make it your floor in this online battle royale of physics silliness. Take the fight with you as you chase friends from walls to floor to ceiling in this versatile online arena!

Squish into SludgeBall to launch to a new surface or Sludge Lurk sneakily under arena obstacles.
Find Boosts as you launch, jump, run, punch, and kick. Knock out friends before time is up!

In Sludge Fighters:
  • Find power-up stations to gain quick advantage - watch out, power-up effects last a limited time!
  • Boosts like Stretchee Arm Punch, Whoa I'm All Big Mode, and Sludgenado Kick-Foot
  • Choose your color
  • Choose swirly sludge or still sludge

data.short_description: Gravity follows you! Get ready for physics-defying fun in this online battle royale! Make any surface your floor: squish into SludgeBall to launch to a surface or Sludge Lurk under obstacles. Find silly Boosts like Whoa I'm All Big Mode as you launch, run, and jump in melee madness!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i3-5020U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
